title: Web-based Task Design Strategies for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Emphasis on customized task design approaches tailored for learners with specialized vocational backgrounds (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners can explain three web-based task design frameworks applicable to actual math classes.
Learners can prototype one digital task reflecting interaction scenarios with ELLs (English Language Learners).
Learners can provide feedback on peers' web task designs using a Q-methodology-based assignment evaluation rubric.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
